html:
Samsung will be having their next Galaxy Unpacked Event on January 22, 2025. It’s expected that Samsung will announce their next S series of flagship smartphones, their One UI 7 preview, XR Smartglasses and more.

You can reserve your preorder bonuses now without any sort of commitment.

You also have the chance to win $5000 in Samsung credit which you can use for anything that Samsung makes, so even if you don’t use their smartphone ecosystem products, that $5000 would certainly afford you a nice TV.

Reserve Offer Bonuses

  • Get a $50 Samsung Credit (redeemable towards ecosystem purchases during preorder)
  • Get 3x Samsung reward points in your pre-order purchase
  • Entry into $5000 Samsung Credit Sweepstakes

Visit Samsung USA to Learn More

When you purchase through links on our site, we may earn an affiliate commission. Here's how it works.
